name: tsmean
description: Tutorial Page how to setup the TypeScript-Mean project from scratch

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r img dist && npm run mustache && npm run roadmap
scripts.roadmap: tsc src/roadmap/roadmap.ts --outDir dist/roadmap/ && cp src/roadmap/roadmap.css dist/roadmap/roadmap.css && cp src/roadmap/roadmap.html dist/roadmap/roadmap.html
